welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Port Moresby, the vibrant capital of Papua New Guinea! Get ready to experience the city's unique blend of traditional culture, beautiful coastal landscapes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Port Moresby has to offer."
